backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining storage, authorization mixins, and all domain types such as schools, payments, staff profiles, packing, notifications, and training visits.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing routing, pages, hooks, demo mode utilities, styles, and admin features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining OKLCH color tokens, theme variables, and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring GlobalErrorBoundary, theme provider, single QueryClient instance, and TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/demo/DemoDataUna: Alert component shown in Demo Mode when requested demo data is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/demo/DemoPreview: Demo Mode banner with role switching, corrupted-data reset warning, and query invalidation/navigation handling.
frontend/src/components/error/GlobalErro: Global error boundary that catches rendering failures and provides a fallback UI with option to redirect to login.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout handling identity, demo mode, profile loading, redirects, and role-based navigation rendering.
frontend/src/components/layout/RoleNav.t: Role-specific navigation menu that updates on role changes and highlights the active route.
frontend/src/components/notifications/No: Notifications dropdown showing unread items with options to mark one or all as read.
frontend/src/components/schools/SchoolSe: Searchable school list with filtering, loading states, and role-based action links.
frontend/src/demo/demoDataStore.ts: LocalStorage-based demo datastore for schools, outstanding amounts, packing data, training visits, and academic queries.
frontend/src/demo/demoGuards.ts: Guards that enforce allowed actions in demo mode and block disallowed mutations.
frontend/src/demo/demoProfile.ts: Generates synthetic user profiles for each role during demo mode.
frontend/src/demo/demoRoutes.ts: Maps staff roles to their demo-mode dashboard routes.
frontend/src/demo/demoSession.ts: Manages demo session state, credentials, role selection, and persistence via localStorage.
frontend/src/demo/useDemoPreview.ts: Hook for reading and updating demo-mode state, including role switching and exit.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend or demo data, using the actor for authenticated calls.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures global Tailwind styles, CSS variables for themes, and custom button styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/academic/AcademicQuer: Lists all academic queries and provides a dialog for responding with status updates and school-related info.
frontend/src/pages/accounts/SchoolPaymen: Displays school details, packing status, counts, and academic queries for a selected school.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSchoolDeta: Shows consolidated school details including metadata, packing info, visits, queries, and update history.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AuditLogPage.ts: Fetches and filters audit logs with search and type filters, showing system activity entries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/OutstandingAmou: Allows selecting a school and viewing or updating its outstanding payment amount with validation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/StaffManagement: Provides UI to list, create, edit, and repair staff profiles using modal dialogs and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AcademicDa: Displays counts of open and resolved academic queries with quick navigation to the queries page.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AccountsDa: Shows total registered schools and includes a school search panel for financial management.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Aggregates system-wide metrics including schools, outstanding amounts, packing status, and academic queries.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/MarketingD: Shows school totals, outstanding amounts, and expandable school details with packing and outstanding info.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PackingDas: Provides packing overview with school count and quick navigation to packing-related actions.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/TrainingDa: Displays training-related metrics including school totals, open/solved queries, and a school status table.
frontend/src/pages/IndexGatePage.tsx: Redirects users to login or role-based dashboards based on identity, demo mode, and profile state.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements login via Internet Identity or demo credentials, handling redirects, errors, and UI states.
frontend/src/pages/marketing/SchoolCreat: Form page for creating a new school, submitting details via mutation and navigating based on user role.
frontend/src/pages/packing/packingOption: Exports constant packing class and theme option lists.
frontend/src/pages/packing/PackingSchool: Lists all schools with search and selection to navigate to packing management for a specific school.
frontend/src/pages/packing/SchoolPacking: Displays and updates a school's packing status and per-theme/class packing counts.
frontend/src/pages/schools/SchoolDetails: Shows school details with admin‑only editing to update school information.
frontend/src/pages/training/SchoolTraini: Manages training visits, academic queries, and displays related school, packing, and outstanding data.
frontend/src/pages/training/TrainingQuer: Displays all academic queries raised by the user with loading and status badges.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the app’s TanStack Router structure, including login, authenticated layout, demo-mode handling, and role-based dashboard/feature routes.
frontend/src/utils/getErrorMessage.ts: Provides a safe extractor for readable error messages, with special handling for BigInt serialization failures.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, themes, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, known issues, and feature requirements related to fixing blank-screen routing and auth behavior.
